Medium-ICA-Conditional-1.description: Kill a rival prospector at the Bright Sands Comms Tower

Medium-ICA-Conditional-2.description: Kill two rival prospectors at the Bright Sands Base Camp

Medium-ICA-Conditional-3.description: Kill hostile creatures at the Bright Sands Dig Site and retrieve Compound Sheets

Medium-ICA-Conditional-4.description: Kill hostile creatures at the Bright Sands Water Facility and the Power Plant next to Comms Tower

NEW-Easy-ICA-Gather-1.description: Prospector, we need you to bring us Scrap Metal so we can produce more cooking equipment for the ICA community kitchen.

NEW-Easy-ICA-Gather-2.description: Our community hospital is running out of gauze to make bandages. Drop down to the surface and bring us some Polymetallic Prefabricate!

NEW-Easy-ICA-Gather-3.description: Prospector! There is a small fracture in the station's hull. It's not huge, but please go get us the Alloys needed to patch it up.

NEW-Easy-ICA-Gather-4.description: There you are, Prospector. Osiris seems to be after those Spinal Bases from Fortuna III creatures. We are not sure why, so bring us a sample.

NEW-Easy-ICA-Gather-5.description: We need to do some repairs to our water filtration system. Bring us Polymetallic Prefabricate and Compound Sheets.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Gather-1.description: The ICA community housing project has been expanding fast, and we need Azure Tree Bark and Alloys to build some new beds.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Gather-2.description: Prospector, we need to make improvements to our scrapping station. For this, bring us Shard Slicers, a Zero Systems CPU and Hardened Metals.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Gather-3.description: The targeting systems of our station defense systems have been damaged by Storm radiation. Bring us Autoloaders and Optic Glass for the repairs.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Gather-4.description: Our engineers designed a safer airlock system that should reduce fatalities. We need Hardened Metals, Alloys and Polymetallic Prefabricate.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Gather-1.description: Prospector! Those Korolev simpletons are drilling near one of our Uplinks. Bring us Zero Systems CPUs and Derelict Explosives. You know why.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Gather-2.description: We have received reports of Old Currency being found on Fortuna. That stuff is pretty valuable. Bring us some!

NEW-Hard-ICA-Gather-3.description: Upgrades to our rifles are long overdue. To go into production with improved Recoil Compensators, we need Shock Absorbers and Compound Sheets.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Gather-and-PvE-4.description: Osiris is gaining an incredible amount of energy from Charged Spinal Bases. Go kill creatures to cut off their supply and get us some samples.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Gather-5.description: Prospector! To help us provide our troops with the gear and supplies they require, we need Shard Slicers and Autoloaders for a new 3D printer.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Mine-1.description: Prospector. It seems like Korolev is working on some sort of new laser rifle that uses Pure Focus Crystals. Go get us some, and be discrete about it.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Mine-2.description: Gear up and go get us some Meteor Fragments and Clear Veltecite! If the rumors are true, this stuff could power our station systems for weeks!

NEW-Easy-ICA-Hunt-1.description: Ah! There you are, Prospector. Before we give you any real work, go hunt some creatures to prove your worth, then report back to me.

NEW-Easy-ICA-Hunt-2.description: We're considering equipping our troops with rifles against the creatures of Fortuna III. Grab an Assault Rifle, go down there and kill creatures with it.

NEW-Easy-ICA-Hunt-3.description: Prospector. Creatures are hindering our Research Teams from landing at Base Camp. You know what to do.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Hunt-1.description: We need you to eliminate Marauders and Rattlers, Prospector! They're a threat to our scouts and scavengers.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Hunt-2.description: We need your help, Prospector. Our Warehouse at Nutrion Farms got overrun by creatures. Get there before they destroy our stocked rations.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Hunt-1.description: We want you to test out killing Marauders from a distance, see how easy they are to track... and how fast they can close in.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Hunt-2.description: Rattlers are messing with what's left of the old Bright Sands Comms Tower facility; make sure they don't turn the place into a new nest.

NEW-Medium-ICA-PvP-1.description: Those insufferable Osiris idiots are messing with our Uplinks. It's time to send a message. Eliminate a rival Prospector using an ICA Weapon, let them know it was us.

NEW-Medium-ICA-PvP-2.description: One of our scavenging parties was taken out by Prospectors. That offense can't go unpunished: eliminate some Prospectors to send a message.

NEW-Medium-ICA-PvP-3.description: Fortuna III's seen a spike in "fake" Prospectors, here just to take in the scenery. Go down there and set the tone: take some out with an Assault Rifle.

NEW-Hard-ICA-PvP-and-PvE-1.description: A big arms merchant is on station looking to buy; head down and take out Striders, Rattlers, and Prospectors with the Advocate to help secure us a sale.

NEW-Hard-ICA-PvP-1.description: Prospectors have been vandalizing what's left of the Bright Sands Base Camp; go down there and teach them some manners.

NEW-Hard-ICA-PvP-2.description: Some believe Osiris and Korolev weapons outclass ours. Use ICA weapons to "educate" rival Prospectors as to who really makes the best guns.

NEW-Hard-ICA-PvP-3.description: I need someone to head down to the Bright Sands Jungle and make sure other Prospectors and the local wildlife learn to stay out of it. No, you don't need to know why.

NEW-Easy-ICA-Uplink-1.description: Ah, Prospector. We have a task for you. Bring a Data Drive to the Planet and load it with Uncommon Data at one of our Uplinks.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Uplink-1.description: The Data you brought us was helpful, but we need more precise Meteorological Values. Load a Data Drive with Rare Data and deliver it to us.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Uplink-2.description: Good work last time, Prospector. The Data was perfect. This time, bring us two Rare Data Drives.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Uplink-1.description: In order to be able to predict Storm Behaviour more precisely, we will need higher quality Data. Bring us a Valuable Data Drive.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Uplink-2.description: Yes! The more precise Data you brought us was a great success! Do you think you are ready to bring us a Unique Data Drive?

NEW-Hard-ICA-Uplink-3.description: We're finding more than just Storm data now... Get us more Unique Data Drives, Prospector, what we might find could have immeasurable value!

NEW-Easy-ICA-Powerup-1.description: The ICA draws a majority of its power from Miniature Reactors scavenged in old Power Facilities. Bring us one, Prospector.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Powerup-1.description: We need more power for our Community Life Support Systems, Prospector! Go get us more Miniature Reactors.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Powerup-2.description: Our Security Systems ran out of power and are runnning on emergency backup. This is not sustainable. We need more Miniature Reactors.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Powerup-1.description: Prospector. We have gotten our hands on a load of powerful Energy Rifles Korolev has been working on. We need Miniature Reactors to charge them.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Gather-and-PvE-1.description: Prospector! The Spinal Bases you brought us proved to be quite the source of energy. We need more. Go hunt Creatures and bring us their Spinal Bases.

NEW-Easy-ICA-Stash-1.description: Prospector. You have heard of Badum's Dead Drop Containers, right? We need you to find the one at Swamp Skeleton and stash Grenades in it for our Troops.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Stash-1.description: Prospector, the Storm has been distorting all signals from our Comms Tower. We need you to head down there and stash Magnetic Field Stabilizers there.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Stash-2.description: We'll have to do business with a rather shady arms dealer to supply our troops. They want us to stash Old Currency near Nutrion Farms as payment. Go.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Stash-3.description: We are preparing an ambush on a spy that stole essential plans from us. For this, go stash a Shattergun in the Main Office Dead Drop at Base Camp.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Stash-4.description: Prospector. Got a mission for you. Go stash a Miniature Reactor in the Storage Room Dead Drop at Nutrion Farms, as emergency power supply.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Stash-5.description: Our Field Agents need more Ammo if they are to protect our Research Installations. Go stash Medium Ammo at Stockpile near Greens Prospect for them.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Stash-1.description: Prospector. One of our Scientists is convinced she can predict the Storm, but she needs Data. Stash Rare Data Drives at Fulfilment Center for her.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Stash-2.description: We need to make more construction materials available to building sites on Crescent Falls. Go stash Polymetallic Prefabricate near Greens Prospect.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Stash-3.description: One of the Servers at Starport has been failing. Before we can send down a Technician, stash new Zero Systems CPUs for them in the Server Room.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Stash-4.description: Our field agent requested better gear to take down some creatures hindering his mission. Stash an Advocate Rifle at the Starport Cafeteria for him.

NEW-Easy-ICA-Flora-1.description: Prospector, we are running low on food and need your help. Go get us some Waterweed Filaments for our Nutrient Farms. And hurry please.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Flora-1.description: We have to ask you once more to deliver some Waterweed Filaments to us. And more this time, to make sure we can feed the community a bit longer.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Flora-and-PvP-1.description: What?! Osiris has been harvesting OUR Waterweed for their Research? Go get us more Waterweed Filaments and eliminate a Prospector, as a warning!

Main-ICA-FTUE-1.description: "Welcome! The ICA is always looking for new Prospectors to work with, but let's see if you have what it takes. Can you get us this item from the surface?"
Main-ICA-FTUE-1.chainDescription: The Independent Civilian Advisory are all about keeping Prospect Station afloat and everyone in it alive. Will you step up and help? A talented prospector could benefit from being on their good side...

Main-ICA-GainTrust-1.description: "Great! We're always in need of basic materials to help maintain this station and all its thousands of parts. Speaking of which..."

Main-ICA-GainTrust-2.description: "Critters at the Lagoon on Bright Sands have been getting in the way of our Salvage Troops. Killing a few should scare them off for a while."

Main-ICA-GainTrust-3.description: "Some of our air filters are starting to show wear; get me these parts so we can fix them up before they fail."

Main-ICA-GainTrust-4.description: "A lot of our crafts use Azure Tree Bark, but it's hard to obtain with all the dangerous creatures on the surface. Clear out the old Woodcutter Camp on Bright Sands, and bring back some wood while you're at it."

Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-1.description: "Good to see you again! As you know the ICA likes to tinker and create its own tools, and I think prospectors like you will like what we're fixing up now! But first, you'll need to stash a few grenades for us, over in the Swamp."
Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-1.chainDescription: An energetic engineer wants to develop a new kind of grenade, something particularly useful for anyone adventuring on the planet's surface. A decoy of some kind, to throw off rivals and bait hostile creatures, might be just the thing!

Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-2.description: "Very good! We needed those for some live testing on the ground, see what works best against the planet's creatures. On that note, we need some more materials for our prototypes; fetch us these, OK?"
Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-2.chainDescription: An energetic engineer wants to develop a new kind of grenade, something particularly useful for anyone adventuring on the planet's surface. A decoy of some kind, to throw off rivals and bait hostile creatures, might be just the thing!

Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-3.description: "The project's head engineer insists on building some of these new grenades on the planet itself, says it makes them 'authentic' and 'part of the planet'... Not worth arguing about. Make sure she gets the equipment she needs to work, back in the Swamp."
Main-ICA-AudioDecoys-3.chainDescription: An energetic engineer wants to develop a new kind of grenade, something particularly useful for anyone adventuring on the planet's surface. A decoy of some kind, to throw off rivals and bait hostile creatures, might be just the thing!

Main-ICA-GruntWork-1.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-GruntWork-2.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-GruntWork-3.description: "So it was Tao, damn it. He took up prospecting in the early days, before word got out... and before foam kits came standard. Some said he must have just made it big and sneaked off to another system, but I never believed that. I have a lot to think about... and more work for you."
Main-ICA-GruntWork-3.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-GruntWork-4.description: "The ICA may run this station, but its Korolev that owns the veltecite refiners needed to generate its power. The ICA funded research for alternative power sources, before the evacuations. Head down there and get us our data back."
Main-ICA-GruntWork-4.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-GruntWork-5.description: "I'm organizing a team to scout Bright Sands for Tao's comm signal; if he came close enough to an active repeater it should be logged in the network. And I need you to stash some spare equipment for them, just in case."
Main-ICA-GruntWork-5.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-GruntWork-6.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-GruntWork-7.description: "At least I finally know for sure. I have a lot to go through from the data you retrieved, but it looks like Tao was thinking ahead, as always. He knew power would become an issue, and found something that could help. For now, get us Fusion Batteries, it's what he was looking for on his last drop. And shoot some aliens for him while you're down there, he'd have liked that."
Main-ICA-GruntWork-7.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-GruntWork-8.description: "Tao collected a lot of old research, it's hard to tell what's useful and what's just theory. Stash these items at the Bright Sands' Base Camp, I'll send someone down there to run some tests on the surface, don't want to risk blowing a hole out of the station."
Main-ICA-GruntWork-8.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-GasGrenades-1.description: "There was something that will interest you among all the data you recovered; get these items to the Comms Tower stash and we can begin working on a new kind of grenade."
Main-ICA-GasGrenades-1.chainDescription: The ICA are developing a new grenade type, equipped with lethal toxic gasses. Help them get what they need, those things would be great for area denial... or getting rid of anyone holed up in a fortified position.

Main-ICA-GasGrenades-2.description: "We'll need something 'special' for these; head down and retrieve these items for us, then we'll have a crack at synthesizing the right juices to make this work. I think you'll love the results..."
Main-ICA-GasGrenades-2.chainDescription: The ICA are developing a new grenade type, equipped with lethal toxic gasses. Help them get what they need, those things would be great for area denial... or getting rid of anyone holed up in a fortified position.

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-1.description: "Our people have gone through more of the data Tao recovered, and this might just make sense. We'll need some mag stabs to start our tests, and more importantly, Meteor Fragments."
Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-1.chainDescription: Prospect Station's power woes may soon be over. You just need to retrieve some very delicate machinery, get some highly radioactive meteor fragments, and help the ICA build a highly experimental power generator. A prospector's life is definitely never boring.

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-2.description: "This sort of research requires equipment we don't have at hand, and I know Osiris isn't just going to give it to us... Check these locations and get us some Co-Tec Multitools, Prospector."
Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-2.chainDescription: Prospect Station's power woes may soon be over. You just need to retrieve some very delicate machinery, get some highly radioactive meteor fragments, and help the ICA build a highly experimental power generator. A prospector's life is definitely never boring.

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-3.description: "I read through the report you brought back; it's not the easy win I had hoped for, but my people assure me they can make improvements on the original designs to make it work. We'll need some meteor cores first, of course. Oh, and take out some other prospectors; reports of increased violence should keep any Korolev people on the field away, don't want them getting curious about what we're up to."
Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-3.chainDescription: Prospect Station's power woes may soon be over. You just need to retrieve some very delicate machinery, get some highly radioactive meteor fragments, and help the ICA build a highly experimental power generator. A prospector's life is definitely never boring.

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-4.description: "I'm preparing to send a team down to the surface to finalize a prototype and run tests well away from the station; everyone assures me it's safe, but I've read the warning myself. I need you to cull the number of creatures at these locations, it should make life for my people easier."
Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-4.chainDescription: Prospect Station's power woes may soon be over. You just need to retrieve some very delicate machinery, get some highly radioactive meteor fragments, and help the ICA build a highly experimental power generator. A prospector's life is definitely never boring.

Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-5.description: "One of the supply crates for our project was left open under the rain, damaged most of the contents and now my team needs replacement parts. Stash them somewhere safe, we need to finish that prototype."
Main-ICA-MeteorReactor-5.chainDescription: Prospect Station's power woes may soon be over. You just need to retrieve some very delicate machinery, get some highly radioactive meteor fragments, and help the ICA build a highly experimental power generator. A prospector's life is definitely never boring.

Main-ICA-CommunityWork-1.description: "Good, you're here. We have a request from a former colonist to stash some items on the surface. We get these from time to time; it started out as people hoping their loved ones were still down there, in need of supplies... These days it's just a ritual for them. I guess this is how weird traditions start, huh?"
Main-ICA-CommunityWork-1.chainDescription: The ICA often receives job commissions and requests for prospectors to carry out, acting as a sort of middleman to access the planet. Handling these jobs keeps the the ICA happy, and they pay well enough, too.

Main-ICA-CommunityWork-2.description: "Another prospector took a bad beating in Crescent Falls; foam kit failed to deploy fully and left his arm exposed. Not much left of it when the retrieval bot got to him, and he wants revenge. I hope you can satisfy his request?"
Main-ICA-CommunityWork-2.chainDescription: The ICA often receives job commissions and requests for prospectors to carry out, acting as a sort of middleman to access the planet. Handling these jobs keeps the the ICA happy, and they pay well enough, too.

Main-ICA-CommunityWork-3.description: "Fruit from Fortuna III fetches a nice price in the Artery systems, rare delicacy from a deadly world and all that. Growing it on the station would be a lot easier, don't you think?"
Main-ICA-CommunityWork-3.chainDescription: The ICA often receives job commissions and requests for prospectors to carry out, acting as a sort of middleman to access the planet. Handling these jobs keeps the the ICA happy, and they pay well enough, too.

Main-ICA-OilSearch-1.description: "Project Fireball was a bust, barely any power output before all the safeties kicked in and deadlocked the system. At least we have a lead on alternative, something called 'NiC' they were searching for in several locations. Head to the first one on the list for me, once it's clear I can send a few people down to investigate."
Main-ICA-OilSearch-1.chainDescription: Things didn't work out with the prototype power generator, but at least it didn't blow up. The research you gathered hinted at another project, so there's still some hope the ICA can find alternative power source and get out from under Korolev's thumb.

Main-ICA-OilSearch-2.description: "This whole ordeal has sapped too many of our funds and resources, we need to get back in people's minds, and their cash in our pockets. I want you to head to the old Geothermal Plant and remind anyone in the area that ICA sells the best weaponry. And bring back some loot while you're in the area, for the sake of appearances."
Main-ICA-OilSearch-2.chainDescription: Things didn't work out with the prototype power generator, but at least it didn't blow up. The research you gathered hinted at another project, so there's still some hope the ICA can find alternative power source and get out from under Korolev's thumb.

Main-ICA-OilSearch-3.description: "Another location mentioned is around the Skeleton Research area; head there and clear it out. Hrmm, the wrong people might start getting curious about what we're up to... bring back some Rattler Skins and salvaged equipment; you know, normal prospector work."
Main-ICA-OilSearch-3.chainDescription: Things didn't work out with the prototype power generator, but at least it didn't blow up. The research you gathered hinted at another project, so there's still some hope the ICA can find alternative power source and get out from under Korolev's thumb.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork-1.description: "I've been sitting on a fairly 'particular' commission from an out of system arms company for some time, but I think you're up to the task. They want 'real world' data on the efficacy of pistols used against other armed opponents. Fortuna III's peculiar legal status and the use of emergency foam kits makes it a perfect testing ground, you see."
Main-ICA-ExtraWork-1.chainDescription: Some more private work has come up, and you're the right Prospector for the job.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork-2.description: "We have reports of increased creature activity in several locations; go to each and thin out their numbers."
Main-ICA-ExtraWork-2.chainDescription: Some more private work has come up, and you're the right Prospector for the job.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork-3.description: "A private researcher has requested we help them acquire certain creature parts; apparently they usually got them from Osiris for free, but they've cut off his supply after some personal dispute."
Main-ICA-ExtraWork-3.chainDescription: Some more private work has come up, and you're the right Prospector for the job.

Main-ICA-OilPump-1.description: "Our people on the surface analyzed everything at the locations you cleared, and they only found some crude oil-like sludge, but it barely burns. It might be nothing, but it's the only outlier. They need specialized equipment to transport samples back home, stash what they need at the Nutrion Farms Office, Prospector."
Main-ICA-OilPump-1.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a of tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-2.description: "While our people look into the 'crude' samples, there might be something we can search for in the surface networks about it; you'll need to check Uplink stations on Crescent Falls, then we can see if there's anything there about that makes sense out of this."
Main-ICA-OilPump-2.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a of tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-3.description: "We finally know that 'NiC' stands for Nanite-infused Crude. Someone figured out a way to the trigger a reaction in the nanobots' own batteries and get a small burst of energy from them; not much, but with billions of bots in a liter of NiC, it could be the answer to our energy troubles. Now, we just need to build some pumps! Get us these materials so we can fix up a first batch."
Main-ICA-OilPump-3.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a of tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-4.description: "While we work on building those pumps, a request from a local artist has come in for Hardened Bone Plates; they apparently make for a good crafting material. Kill some Marauders and complete the order for us, please."
Main-ICA-OilPump-4.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a of tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-6.description: "Getting these pumps to work isn't as simple as we'd hoped. The pumps need to refine the NiC to eliminate as much crude as possible and concentrate the nanites in one convenient package ready for use, and that process requires some high tech components, not just a 'crude' oil pump... Here's what we need for now."
Main-ICA-OilPump-6.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a of tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-7.description: "That Dr. Sullivan is starting to poke around and ask questions, he likes to think Osiris are the only ones that can do any research around here. But if he's curious, then so is that Korolev snake. Head to the surface and perform some 'live' tests with ICA guns, and I'll spread scuttlebutt that we're workng on new weapon improvements."
Main-ICA-OilPump-7.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a of tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilPump-8.description: "You're back just in time; the tech guys have a new list of things they need to finalize NiC refiner and install them in the pumps. After that it will just be a matter of calling them down in the right spot..."
Main-ICA-OilPump-8.chainDescription: Marie's research team has only found a of tarry liquid reminiscent of crude oil, but it doesn't burn easily. Never mind that actual crude would need more power to get out of orbit and onto the station than it could ever generate... Someone thought it was worth looking into, though, and the ICA is getting desperate.

Main-ICA-OilScanModule-1.description: "We've got working oil pumps, but the yield will never be what we need if we don't know where the best wells are. Thankfully we have plans for a new Scanner mod, able to pinpoint any nearby concentrations of nanites. Get us these items and we'll get one made as soon as we can."
Main-ICA-OilScanModule-1.chainDescription: You may be able to stumble upon a good oil well by chance, but the ICA can't depend on just dumb luck alone if they want this project to succeed.  A new mod for your Scanner will ensure you always know where to call down Oil Pumps.

Main-ICA-OilScanModule-2.description: "Excellent, but you're not done yet. These are the last components we need, I promise."
Main-ICA-OilScanModule-2.chainDescription: You may be able to stumble upon a good oil well by chance, but the ICA can't depend on just dumb luck alone if they want this project to succeed.  A new mod for your Scanner will ensure you always know where to call down Oil Pumps.

Main-ICA-TestRun-1.description: "We've gotten reports of Crushers near several of the candidate locations for our oil pump test runs. If one of those beasts wanders into the area while the pumps are running, I don't imagine they'd just leave them alone. I'm putting out contracts for Crusher kills; you can take on the first."
Main-ICA-TestRun-1.chainDescription: It's finally time to put everything together and drill for oil! If the ICA can get enough concentrated NiC back onto Prospect Station, they'll be able to keep everything powered on their own, free from the exploitative prices Korolev charges. A lot is riding on this, Prospector.

Main-ICA-TestRun-2.description: "Time to see if our plans will pay out. Use your new Scanner mod find wells, place oil pumps, and bring back some NiC Cannisters. If this works, the entire station will be in your debt, Prospector!"
Main-ICA-TestRun-2.chainDescription: It's finally time to put everything together and drill for oil! If the ICA can get enough concentrated NiC back onto Prospect Station, they'll be able to keep everything powered on their own, free from the exploitative prices Korolev charges. A lot is riding on this, Prospector.

Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-1.description: "Don't spread this around, but the freighter bringing fresh supplies for the station isn't just 'running late', it's missing. Our inventory on several items is already low and getting worse by the day. Thankfully the planet has all we need... it's just 'a bit' hard to get to. Here's a list of what we need the most."

Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-2.description: "I've been stumped trying to find a birthday gift for one of ICA's oldest members, but I think I've finally got it. This woman holds a real grudge against rattlers, says no matter she went in the final evac days, they were there hounding her. Head to these locations and take some out, I'm sure she'll love the footage."

Main-ICA-ExtraWork2-3.description: "I appreciate you doing that for me... but I have one more thing to ask. If you could get me some rattler skins and bone plates, it'll make the presentation of my gift so much better. Thank you!"

Main-ICA-Unique-1.description: "I'm glad you're here, something has just come and we need someone on the surface. An evac ship pilot caught sight of an 'SOS' after trying a new approach for the first time, but saw nobody in the area. We're not sure how long it's been there, but I'd like you to check the area for me."
Main-ICA-Unique-1.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-Unique-2.description: "I'm not surprised you didn't find anyone... I think I know who left the SOS there, it's something he joked about in case he ever got stranded. Check this next location for me, Prospector."

objectives.itemToOwn: Sign of Life from Stranded Prospector

Main-ICA-Unique-2.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-Unique-3.description: "We found a number of candidate locations Tao could have visited, but there's one only a skilled prospector can access. Head there, and check the nearby Uplink; if I kno- knew, Tao, he'll have saved something for us to find."
Main-ICA-Unique-3.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-Unique-4.description: "There were quite a few people involved with this research, it doesn't make sense that it was just forgotten. There should be more research kept in the surface power plants' head offices; check the one on Bright Sands first."
Main-ICA-Unique-4.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-Unique-5.description: "This looks very promising, if what the research you brought back is accurate, not only would we be solving our power issues here, but we'd have something to compete with Korolev's veltecite monopoly everywhere! There's references to a prototype being built at the Crescent Falls Power Plant; head there and find whatever you can, quick as you can!"
Main-ICA-Unique-5.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

Main-ICA-Unique-6.description: "This stuff is actual crude oil... mixed with billions upon billions of dead nanobots. It must have been used by the Progenitors to help terraform the planet! My predecessors from before the storms set up some pumps to collect the stuff; head to them and retrieve what you can."
Main-ICA-Unique-6.chainDescription: Thousands of people live on Prospect Station without any concept of what it takes to keep the lights on. The ICA needs brave prospectors risking it all to operate on the planet, so they can keep things running in orbit. There's evidence one such prospector got stranded on the surface, now it's up to you to help track them down. Despite all the violence and rivalry, nobody deserves to be left alone on Fortuna III.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Oil-1.description: Damn it! We ran out of Fuel for our Radiation Shields here on the Station. And there's no replacement for Nanite Infused Crude Oil. You know what to do.

NEW-Medium-ICA-Gather-5.description: Aha, there's our new rising star! Prospector, see if you can find us some Magic-GROW Fertilizer, it'll help with our nutrient farms on the station.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Gather-7.description: Wanna make some extra cash? We would pay well for some Nutritional Bars. They taste funny, but nostalgia has deep pockets.

NEW-Hard-ICA-Gather-8.description: A delegation from off system just arrived, and our people need to look their best to woo them for patronage. Get us some Jewellery from the surface, hopefully we can impress.
